title: How to Make Sure Your Dog is Not a Wolf
author: John Panaban
article: Last year alone, there were 234 cases of humans mistakenly bringing home a wolf instead of their pet dog.“John”, whose real name Mark Antonio from 504 Apple Street, said that he was just walking around his neighborhood with his creatively named pet dog “Doggy”. “Then when it’s time to go home to watch TV, I just have a gray wolf sitting on my lap!” “John” asked us to have him an alias to protect his identity. Wolf expert, Wolfy Wooferson, gave us tips and tests to figure out if your dog is actually a dog.

title: Study Finds Humans Love Dogs a Little Too Much
author: John Panaban
article: According to a new study published by the Journal of Mampulan Anthropological Research, humans love dogs a little too much. "Enamored by the cuteness of the furry creatures, humans dedicated an average of about 84% of their income to buying toys

title: Fans Get Crazy… Again as Pawesome Saves the City
author: Falan Stanley
article: In a massive Pangilan metro, you could say another world-destroying event is happening every day. “Pangilan City is safe once again,” said Pawesome
